channel.title: CiTR -- Randophonic
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Randophonic is best thought of as an intraversal jukebox programmed by a vast alien living intelligence system which has no concept of genre, style, nation states or even space-time relevance.
